All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
DB
This class encapsulates the data access operations for Student objects, including reading, modifying, and writing methods involving Student.json files.
DBTest
Test class for the DB class.
GradeApp
A GUI application for displaying student grades and calculating statistics.
HonorApp
The main application window for displaying student honors.
HonorApp.HonorForm
The form for adding a new honor.
InfoApp
The InfoApp class represents an interface that displays and allows modification of a student's basic information.
LearningJourneyApp
The LearningJourneyApp class extends JFrame and provides the functionality to display the learning journey information of a student.
LoginApp
The LoginApp class represents the login interface of the system.
Main
 
ProjApp
this class is used to show all the information of project and make some operation on it
ProjApp.ProjForm
A JFrame class for adding project experience.
SkillApp
This class represents the interface to show all of a student's skills.
SkillApp.SkillForm
This class represents the skill form for adding a new skill.
Student
All class of student, all the getter and setter can be found in this class
Student.Course
 
Student.Honor
 
Student.Project
 
Student.Skill
 
WelcomeApp
The main interface of the learning journey application for an International School.
